dcterms:description: The CONLL 2012 dataset is used for modeling multilingual unrestricted coreference in OntoNotes, serving as a standard reference corpus for coreference resolution.
dcterms:title: CONLL 2012

dcterms:creator: M. Poesio

dcterms:description: The CRAC 2018 dataset is derived from the ARRAU corpus and is used for studying mention detection, as it includes all mentions annotated.
dcterms:title: CRAC 2018

dcterms:creator: J.-D. Kim
T. Ohta
Y. Tateisi
J. Tsujii
dcterms:description: The GENIA corpus is a semantically annotated corpus specifically designed for bio-text mining, focusing on nested named entity recognition.
dcterms:title: GENIA
